dialogue.htmlContent:
Separating the gateway from the fortress's wooden keep, there's nothing but a deserted, squalid courtyard. Discarded bottles, assorted junk, and piles of miscellaneous refuse are scattered haphazardly across the area, giving this place a very run-down and ruinous look.

Over in one corner, there sits the main keep. While of better construction than the perimeter wall, it's nevertheless a very shabby structure. Made primarily out of crudely-formed wooden stakes, and covered with odd pieces of sheet metal and plywood boards, this solitary building is the only point of interest inside the fortress's walls.

While the perimeter wall's hazardous construction prohibits anyone from climbing over it, there's nothing stopping you from utilising your ability to fly in order to get to the other side. Breaking out into a short sprint, you quickly launch yourself into the air, before flying over the defensive barrier and swooping back down to land on the floor of the cavern beyond.

Despite the builders' liberal application of metal sheeting and wooden offcuts, there still exist many small gaps in the keep's walls. From these, slivers of light shine out to cast a pale golden glow on the floor and walls of the fortress's courtyard.

Illumination isn't the only thing that's escaping through the cracks in the walls, for as you approach the poorly-constructed wooden doors before you, sultry giggles and snippets of lewd conversation can be heard coming from within the keep. Although three of these voices are higher-pitched and clearly belonging to imps, a fourth, [npc.feminine] voice sounds a little deeper, and a lot more ominous.

If you were to enter this keep, the occupants would undoubtedly notice you almost immediately. You should be prepared for the worst, and expect to not only have to fight three imps, but also the leader of the gangs which roam the surrounding tunnels...

Having defeated [impFemalesLeader.name], the [impFemalesLeader.race] who led the imp gangs roaming the surrounding tunnels, [impFemalesLeader.her] keep is now completely deserted. The front doors have been left wide-open, and, taking a cursory glance inside, you see that there's absolutely nothing within that would be of interest to you. There's nothing more to do here except turn around and go back the way you came...

#IF pc.isQuestProgressGreaterThan(QUEST_LINE_MAIN, QUEST_MAIN_2_B_SIRENS_CALL) #THEN [style.italicsMinorBad(You get the feeling that [impFemalesLeader.name] will return to reclaim [impFemalesLeader.her] fortress sooner or later!)] #ELSE [style.italicsBad(You get the feeling that [impFemalesLeader.name] will not be back until you've dealt with the Dark Siren!)] #ENDIF

Despite the builders' liberal application of metal sheeting and wooden offcuts, there still exist many small gaps in the keep's walls. From these, slivers of light shine out to cast a pale golden glow on the floor and walls of the fortress's courtyard.

Illumination isn't the only thing that's escaping through the cracks in the walls, for as you approach the poorly-constructed wooden doors before you, sultry giggles and snippets of lewd conversation can be heard coming from within the keep. You can hear the distinctive, ominous voice of [impFemalesLeader.name] as [impFemalesLeader.she] joins [impFemalesLeader.her] three alpha-imp guards in conversation.

As [impFemalesLeader.name] no longer considers you a threat, you could enter the keep without risking a fight...

Pushing on the keep's crude wooden doors, you're pleased to discover that they're not locked, and, with a creak loud enough to make you flinch, they swing open before you. Stepping forwards into the building, you discover that the interior of the structure is just one big open hall. Numerous arcane-powered lanterns are fixed to the walls, and while most of them give off a pale golden hue, there are several which have been coloured to illuminate their surroundings in shades of red, pink, and purple. Colourful sheets of canvas have been hung to conceal the interior walls' shoddy workmanship, while underfoot, rugs, cushions, and blankets completely cover the floor.

Near the opposite end from where you entered, you spot the occupants of this fortress lounging about within a semi-circular pile of plush cushions. While the three feminine alpha-imps are much the same as the guards at the gate, their leader is a light-purple-skinned succubus, who's dressed in some very slutty clothing.

Her long, wavy hair is a beautiful shade of blonde, and as she turns to look at you, you see that she has a gorgeous face, and her eyes are a particularly striking shade of blue. The moment your eyes meet, she instantly puts on a seductive, innocent look, and playfully bites the lower of her plump pink lips, before giggling in a high-pitched, ditzy voice, [npc.speechNoEffects(Ooh, like, who's this #IFpc.isFeminine()#THENpretty little thing?#ELSEbig handsome hunk?#ENDIF I bet you've come lookin' to be my plaything and stuff! And, like, even if you haven't, that's what you're gonna be gettin'! Nobody gets to leave [npc.namePos] joint without, like, bein' used by me first!)]

[npc.Name] playfully splays her feet as she stands up, shamelessly flashing you the black lacy panties she's wearing beneath her pink, pleated microskirt. Her hands and legs are covered in slutty white fishnet garments, and around her chest, a tight-fitting white tubetop is barely managing to keep her huge H-cup breasts under control. Golden hoops dangle from her earlobes, and, made from the same precious material, she's wearing accessories around her wrist, ankle, and finger, with a further golden ring fixed into her nose piercing. Stepping forwards on her bright pink stilettos, the bimbo succubus slowly snakes her tail around one of her slender hands, while the other reaches up to tuck a loose strand of hair back behind her swept-back horns. [npc.speechNoEffects(So, like, what're ya hopin' I'll do first? Perhaps ya thinkin' that I'll #IFpc.hasPenis()#THENride your cock#ELSElick your little pussy#ENDIF and stuff, or maybe yer wishin' I'll push ya down and sit on your face! How about you, like, just submit to me, and maybe you'll get what ya want!)]

The three alpha-imps giggle as they move forwards to back their leader up, and you realise that you only have a moment in which to either defuse the situation, or ready yourself for a fight...

Once again pushing on the keep's crude wooden doors, you discover that they're still not locked, and, with yet another loud creak, they swing open before you. Stepping forwards into the building, you see once again that the interior of the structure is just one big open hall. Numerous arcane-powered lanterns are fixed to the walls, and while most of them give off a pale golden hue, there are several which have been coloured to illuminate their surroundings in shades of red, pink, and purple. Colourful sheets of canvas have been hung to conceal the interior walls' shoddy workmanship, while underfoot, rugs, cushions, and blankets completely cover the floor.

Near the opposite end from where you entered, you spot the familiar occupants of this fortress lounging about within their usual semi-circular pile of plush cushions. [npc.Name] is the first to notice your arrival, and, swaying her [npc.hips+] as she stands up, she calls out, [npc.speechNoEffects(Oh, like, you're back to be my plaything again?)]

Strutting towards you, the slutty succubus moans, [npc.speechNoEffects(Go on, like, just get down and submit!)]

Once again pushing on the keep's crude wooden doors, you discover that they're still not locked, and, with yet another loud creak, they swing open before you. The hall beyond appears much as it did the last time you were here, with the many wall-mounted arcane lanterns casting a soft golden glow over the colourful rugs, cushions, and blankets which cover the floor.

Near the opposite end from where you entered, you spot the familiar occupants of this fortress lounging about within their usual semi-circular pile of plush cushions. Come on, let's have some fun!)]

Ignoring the protestations that are shouted after you in response, you quickly turn your back on [npc.name] and [npc.her] gang, and make haste as you exit the keep...

Obediently doing as you're told, you hurry over to where [npc.name] is standing, before dropping down onto your knees before [npc.herHim]. Smirking down at you, the [npc.race] raises [npc.her] voice so that [npc.she] can be heard over the chorus of giggles and gasps coming from [npc.her] imp guards, and commands, [npc.speechNoEffects(Come over here toy, I've got, like, some super fun plans for you!)]

Wanting to please [npc.name], you once more do as you're commanded, and, crawling after her, you're soon led over to the middle of the cushioned area. Turning around, [npc.name] snaps her fingers and points to the floor beside you. [npc.speechNoEffects(Like, get down on your back and stuff.)]

Doing as you're told, you lie back on the cushioned floor, and no sooner than your head hits the pillows beneath you, the three alpha-imps are crowding around your face. One of them kneels down to your left, and another to your right, with the final one standing a little way behind, ready to subdue you if you should try to sit up. From somewhere off to your side, you hear the succubus calling out, [npc.speechNoEffects(Good job, girls! We wouldn't want our little toy escapin' and stuff!)]

Well, I kinda think it's fun and stuff if my little toy gets fucked by another toy! So, go on, like, say you want to be my little toy, and maybe, just maybe, I'll let ya use my pussy as well!)]

Being in such a compromising position, you're left with no other option but to do as you're told, and you submissively reply, [pc.speech(Please, I want to be your toy! Use me as your plaything!)]
